articles.title: Purdue Professor Unlocks Ancient Secrets: Asteroid Bennu Samples to Shed Light on Life's Origins - HT Tech
articles.description: Professor Michelle Thompson, of Purdue University, leads a groundbreaking mission that collected samples from asteroid Bennu, offering a glimpse into the origins of our solar system.
articles.content: Asteroid Bennu samples are now on Earth and they are all set to set to reveal many secrets of the Universe. These can then be used by mankind to find answers to so many questions that have remained u… [+6182 chars]

articles.title: Apollo group asteroid to come closer than the Moon; Know details of approach - HT Tech
articles.description: An Apollo group Near-Earth Asteroid could pass Earth on October 20, NASA has revealed. It will reportedly come closer than the Moon during its approach.
articles.content: NASA has recently issued details about an asteroid designated as Asteroid 2023 TK15 that is expected to make its closest approach to Earth on October 20. This asteroid has been discovered and tracked… [+2175 chars]
